casebody.data:
No. 10-7180. William B. Saint, Petitioner v. Massachusetts Rehabilitation Commission Home Care Assistance Program. 563 U.S. 1042, 131 S. Ct. 2983,

180 L. Ed. 2d 263,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4252. June 6, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 1147, 131 S. Ct. 923, 178 L. Ed. 2d 770, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 518.
